flawed_nl_solution:
Three dimes is equal to $0.3 because 3 x 0.1 = <<3*0.1=0.3>>0.3
Seven nickels is equal to $0.35 because 7 x 0.05 = <<7*0.05=0.35>>0.35
Each time he trades with dimes he lose $0.05 because 0.3 - 0.25 = <<0.3-0.25=0.05>>0.05
Each time he traded with nickels he lost $0.1 because 0.35 - 0.25 = <<0.35-0.25=0.1>>0.1
He lost $1 from trading with dimes because 20 x 0.05 =<<20*0.05=1>>1
He lost $0.2 from trading with nickels because 20 x 0.1 = <<20*0.1=0.2>>0.2
He lost $1.2 total because 1 + 0.2 = <<1+0.2=1.2>>1.2
#### 1.2000000000000008

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2.000000000000001, not 0.2. It appears the decimal point was misplaced.
